dimes.measurements.nio
Class NetworkStack

java.lang.Object
  dimes.measurements.nio.NetworkStack

public abstract class NetworkStack
extends java.lang.Object

Author:
Ohad Serfaty
The main Abstract class for implementing a native Network Stack

setCallbackBufferSize

public abstract void setCallbackBufferSize(int size)

Set the size of the PacketBuffer. when a receive() method is called with a non-null buffer , it will perform a callback after accumulating this number of packets. Default size is 10 packets.

Parameters:
size - number of packets to buffer before calling 'callback'

receive

public abstract void receive(long listenTimeout,
                             dimes.measurements.nio.packet.PacketBuffer buffer,
                             dimes.measurements.nio.CallbackContext context)
                      throws dimes.measurements.nio.error.MeasurementException

When one of the parameters is null , this function acts like the on of the subsequent receive() functions.

When both buffer and context are not null , the function will listen until the buffer is full and then perform a callback.

Parameters:
listenTimeout - time to listen
buffer - a buffer to fill packets with
context - callback context
Throws:
dimes.measurements.nio.error.MeasurementException

receive

public void receive(long listenTimeout,
                    dimes.measurements.nio.packet.PacketBuffer buffer)
             throws dimes.measurements.nio.error.MeasurementException
listen without callbacks

Parameters:
listenTimeout - time to listen
buffer - a buffer to fill packets with
Throws:
dimes.measurements.nio.error.MeasurementException

receive

public void receive(long listenTimeout,
                    dimes.measurements.nio.CallbackContext callback)
             throws dimes.measurements.nio.error.MeasurementException
listen without buffering

Parameters:
listenTimeout - timeout to listen
callback - callback context object . Please note that this context provides a mechanism to Stop the listening in case that a proper packet arrives...
Throws:
dimes.measurements.nio.error.MeasurementException

getPacketBuilder

public abstract dimes.measurements.nio.packet.builder.PacketBuilder getPacketBuilder()

close the stack and dispose of all resources.

log

public void log(java.lang.String logLevelString,
                java.lang.String logMessage)

The default NativeLogger logging function. to change the native logging mechanism , use setNativeLogger(...) and give your own implementation of the logger.

TODO : find a way to ignore the logging inside the Native code for production measurements.

Parameters:
logLevelString -
logMessage -
